NL System Query: Hello! Can you teach me how to play Quarto?
Can you show me what a win condition looks like?
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition

NL System Query: Can you show me a new win condition?
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition

NL System Query: Is it a win because of the number of pieces?
For this board, can I add one more piece on the third row, the second column?
User Response: Yes, that won't break the win condition.

NL System Query: Can I remove the piece at the lower left corner and still have a win?
User Response: No, that will break the condition.

NL System Query: Is it a win because the pieces are in the same color?
Switch to this board, is it a win because the pieces are in the same color?
Switch to this board, can I rotate the pieces by some degrees?
User Response: Sure, you can rotate the pieces by ninety degrees.

NL System Query: On this board, can I add one more piece on the second row, the fourth column?
User Response: Sure, that will still be a win.

NL System Query: Can I rotate the pieces by some degrees?
